content.description:
Omnibus ergo dandum est aliquid quod teneant, quod 
agnoscantagnosco, -ere: to recognize.
content.question: In the sentence, teneant is translated

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
